about_the_game:
Summary Of The Game:
A journey we think through the eyes of a character trying to stop ZUMBEKUKKA. You will get enough action, platforms and absurdity!

In This Unique Journey;
  • Come face to face with 5 different interface enemies!
  • Swag like picking enemies with 4 different weapons, improve your weapons after a while!
  • Experience an action when it comes , do parkour when it comes to it, jump from place to place!
  • Experience the unique story you want, please do parkour relentlessly, try to enjoy escape from your enemies without have a gun!

Why You Should Get This Game:
  • You should get it because you like the retro graphic style.
  • If you want to move calmly and comfortably in easy mode, if you want to play by pushing your limits in hard mode.
  • You should get it because when you get bored with the game, you can distract your mind with other modes in game.
  • You should get it because I care about your opinions and I will improve the game according to your opinions.
  • You should get it because you will have fun!

Levels And Modes In Game:
  • 4 levels of Jump Time.
  • 4 levels of Run And Jump.
  • 25+ levels of main game.
  • Blind Mode, you can play with this mode with whatever you want.
By the way, these levels and modes will be more than this but first, I need cool my brain, then your opinions.

Musics:
Rebellion - Aim To Head Official
Star Light - Aim To Head Official
Bachelor of Hearts - Aurora Borealis

name: At The Downstairs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Or Faster Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nothing
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: What, you can easily pass all the obstacles you face? So, are you our last hope? So, do you want some absurdity? And are you doing all this to beat the ZUMBEKUKKA at downstairs? Dude, you are really brave!
